short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically hides buttons on certain cloud gaming services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xbox Cloud Gaming works well within Chrome-based browsers, but the two buttons on the top-left of the screen are both distracting and annoying. This extension aims to remedy that; the buttons are automatically hidden after mouse/keyboard inactivity, and will re-appear when you move your mouse. It's that simple.
